pages.title: Navbar
pages.description: Main navigation bar for MechX theme
pages.content: MechX

pages.title: Footer
pages.description: Footer for MechX theme with social and quick links
pages.content:
About MechX

MechX è il tema pensato per ecommerce moderni, veloci e smart. Scegli uno stile tecnologico per il tuo brand.

Links
  • About
  • Contact
  • FAQ
Follow Us
© 2025 MechX. All rights reserved.
pages.styles: footer h5, footer h6 { color: #00ffcc; } footer a:hover { color: #00ffcc !important; }

pages.title: Home
pages.description: Welcome to MechX - Futuristic eCommerce CMS
pages.keywords: mechx, ecommerce, futuristic, CMS, online store
pages.content:
Welcome to MechX

Power up your digital store with futuristic design and seamless performance.

Explore Collections
Ultra Fast

Experience blazing speeds with optimized Bootstrap and backend logic.

Secure

SSL, GDPR, and advanced authentication ensure peace of mind.

Fully Customizable

Design your store your way with GrapesJS, modular themes, and smart plugins.

Latest Collections

Customer Testimonials

See what others say about MechX CMS.

\"MechX transformed our eCommerce presence with speed and style!\"

Luca, Tech Store Owner

\"The modularity and customization are next-level. Highly recommend.\"

Elena, Digital Consultant

Join the MechX Movement

Create your store today and embrace futuristic eCommerce.

Get Started
pages.styles: #mechx-hero { background-color: #0d0d0d; color: #ffffff; background-image: linear-gradient(145deg, #0d0d0d 50%, #1e1e1e 100%); } .btn-outline-light { border-color: #00ffcc; color: #00ffcc; } .btn-outline-light:hover { background-color: #00ffcc; color: #0d0d0d; }

pages.title: About Us
pages.description: Discover the mission behind MechX CMS
pages.keywords: about us, mission, vision, mechx, ecommerce
pages.content:
Our Mission

MechX was born to empower futuristic online stores with powerful tools, automation, and bold design.

Innovation First

We fuse technology with modern UX/UI to ensure that your eCommerce stands out and performs at peak levels.

Why Choose Us?

  • Built with Bootstrap 5.3.3
  • AI-ready components
  • Modular multi-tenant system
  • Integrated analytics & SEO tools
pages.styles: #about-mechx { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #111, #1f1f1f); color: white; } h3 { color: #00ffcc; } ul li { margin-bottom: 10px; font-size: 1rem; }

pages.title: Collections
pages.keywords: collections, mechx, futuristic catalog, shop categories
pages.content:
Explore Our Collections

Shop cutting-edge categories designed for innovation and performance.
pages.styles: #mechx-collections { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f0f0f, #1a1a1a); color: white; } h2 { color: #00ffcc; } #collections-container .card { background-color: #1f1f1f; border: none; transition: transform 0.3s; } #collections-container .card:hover { transform: scale(1.03); }

pages.title: Products
pages.description: Discover our high-tech products built for the future
pages.keywords: products, shop, MechX catalog, futuristic ecommerce
pages.content:
All Products

Explore our complete range of futuristic tools and gadgets.
pages.styles: #mechx-products { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0d0d0d, #222); color: white; } h2 { color: #00ffcc; } #products-container .card { background-color: #1f1f1f; border: none; transition: transform 0.3s; } #products-container .card:hover { transform: scale(1.03); }

pages.title: Product
pages.description: View details and specs of our advanced product
pages.content:
Product Title

This futuristic device redefines performance and design.

  • Category: Tech Gear
  • Price: €199.99
  • Availability: In Stock
pages.styles: #mechx-product { background-color: #101010; } #mechx-product h1 { color: #00ffaa; } #mechx-product button { border: 2px solid #00ffaa; color: #00ffaa; } #mechx-product button:hover { background-color: #00ffaa; color: #000; }

pages.title: Cart
pages.description: Review your selected products and proceed to checkout
pages.content:
Your Shopping Cart

Total: €0.00

Proceed to Checkout
pages.styles: #mechx-cart h2 { color: #00ffaa; } #mechx-cart .btn-outline-success { border-color: #00ffaa; color: #00ffaa; } #mechx-cart .btn-outline-success:hover { background-color: #00ffaa; color: #000; } table td, table th { vertical-align: middle !important; }

pages.title: Contact Us
pages.description: Get in touch with our team for any inquiries
pages.content:
Get in Touch

Our support team is here to help you 24/7. Reach out for questions, feedback, or custom requests.

  • +39 012 345 6789
  • support@mechx.com
  • Viale della Tecnologia, 42 - Milano
pages.styles: #mechx-contact h2 { color: #00ffaa; } .btn-success { background-color: #00ffaa; border: none; } .btn-success:hover { background-color: #00cc88; }

pages.title: Special Launch Offer
pages.description: Discover exclusive deals and limited-time offers
pages.content:
🚀 MechX Launch Week

Celebrate our launch with limited-time discounts on all features and themes!

Explore Products

Fast Performance

Optimized for speed and scalability.

Secure & Reliable

Enterprise-grade infrastructure included.

Custom Themes

Choose from a wide range of professional designs.
